column1: Petershagen-Eggersdorf is a municipality in the district Märkisch-Oderland

column2: situated 30 km east of Berlin centre
column3: is composed by the main settlement of Petershagen and by Eggersdorf.

column1: The village is well connected to Berlin by the S-Bahn line S5 at the station of Petershagen Nord. The stop is so named (P. North) due to the existence of "Petershagen Süd" (P. South)
column2: a railway station on a line
